text: Melvin Earl "Mel" Clark (July 7, 1926 - May 1, 2014) was an American Major League Baseball outfielder. He went to Ohio University and was signed by the Philadelphia Phillies in 1947. He played with the Phillies from 1951 to 1955 and with the Detroit Tigers in 1957. He was born in Letart, West Virginia. Clark died on May 1, 2014 in West Columbia, West Virginia, aged 87. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1926 births Category:2014 deaths Category:American baseball players Category:Detroit Lions players Category:Disease-related deaths in West Virginia Category:Philadelphia Phillies players Category:Sportspeople from West Virginia
